thread.title: Houma man arrested for sexually assaulting minor
thread.title_full: Houma man arrested for sexually assaulting minor - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Houma man arrested for sexually assaulting minor
text:
TERREBONNE PARISH, LA (WVUE) - Terrebonne Parish detectives arrested a Houma man for sexually assaulting a minor. Police arrested 30-year-old Smokey James McClain, Monday evening.
According to police, the mother of the child contacted the TPSO at the end of September and filed a report. She told authorities that her child was sexually assaulted by a family acquaintance, identified as Smokey McClain.
McClain, who was already in the Terrebonne Parish Jail for simple burglary, was charged for sexual battery on a child. He remains in jail on a $150,000 bond.
The investigation into the incident continues.
